I didn't see this episode but Saitou and Hijikata did travel to Osaka to recruit 
new members.  That is what I understand from Shinsengumi history (shrugs).

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Jon Mesina" <okita_souji@o...> wrote:
> Hey all, this is a question to those who have seen episode 26. And to 
anyone who knows a lot about Shinsengumi history. This has been on my 
mind ever since I saw the ep. 
> 
> S
> P
> O
> I
> L
> E
> R
> 
> S
> P
> A
> C
> E 
> 
> The whole incident with the Osaka official Uchiyama Hikojiro is shown in 
this episode. Now my question is, did this really happen in history? I'm 
wondering since I never heard anything about this before. If anyone can 
answer this it would be greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance!
> 
> ~Okita
